org.apache.heron.integration_topology_test.common

Class AbstractTestTopology

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.heron.integration_topology_test.common.AbstractTestTopology
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicTopologyOneTask, BasicTopologyOneTask, BasicTopologyOneTask, FieldsGrouping, StatefulBasicTopologyOneTask

    public abstract class AbstractTestTopology
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to abstract out the common parts of the test framework for submitting topologies. Subclasses can implement buildTopology and call submit.
